competition_summary.context: Competition Residential Connectivity & Platforms Broadband We compete with a number of companies offering internet services, including: • wireline telecommunications companies • wireless telecommunications companies • municipal broadband networks and power companies • satellite broadband providers Certain wireline telecommunications companies, such as AT&T, Frontier, Lumen and Verizon in the United States and BT and Virgin Media in the United Kingdom, have built and are continuing to build fiber
